message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value to me, I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special price of $120. This is a great chance to acquire something truly valuable at an attractive discount. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it would bring to me. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your perspective, I must respectfully decline your counteroffer. Considering the unique value and quality of our product, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial solution. I am proposing a price of $105 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while still ensuring a satisfactory return for us. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $97.50. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product, and I'm willing to make a commitment to purchase it at this price.
